title: Property Valuers Profession Act
description: Legislation that establishes the regulatory framework for property valuers in South Africa.

title: Code of Conduct for Registered Persons
description: Outlines the standards of professional behavior expected from registered property valuers.

title: Rules for Property Valuers Profession
description: General Notice 653 published on 13 December 2019 outlining rules for the profession.

title: Guidelines for Lodging a Complaint
description: Step-by-step guidance for submitting formal complaints to the SACPVP.

title: Complaint Form
description: Official document to be used when lodging a complaint against a registered professional.

title: Rules for Disciplinary Proceedings
description: Procedures governing disciplinary actions and the handling of misconduct cases.

title: Rules for the Procedure of Nomination
description: Gazetted rules outlining how nominations are conducted within the Council structure.

title: Timeline for Disciplinary Process
description: Visual or tabulated overview of the steps and timeframes in the disciplinary process.
